employment_separation.title: EMPLOYMENT SEPARATION
employment_separation.resignation: The Company requests at least two weeks' written notice of an employee's intent to resign. An exit interview may be requested.
employment_separation.termination: All employment is 'at-will,' meaning either the Company or the employee can terminate the relationship at any time, with or without notice or reason, as allowed by law.
employment_separation.personal_possessions_and_return_of_compa: All Company property (e.g., computer equipment, keys, credit cards) must be returned immediately upon termination. Employees are responsible for any lost or damaged items.
